channel.title: Small graphic glitch on Alien Grunt
channel.description:
Hi Guys,
Found a small graphical glitch on a Alien Grunt in Lamda Core. Just before entering the last safe haven with a couple of scientist and a annoying Barney :slight_smile: , there lay a couple of dead grunts on the floor. One of them had a glitch on it's weapon. It showed purple/black blocks. (Some sort of 'replace me' texture I guess.
Cheers, Quintus
![2016-01-02_00001.jpg|690x500](upload://bz9X9tW1ugWdqWqp1BEt0Mknczh.jpeg)

item.title: Small graphic glitch on Alien Grunt
item.dc:creator: Sage_J_Fox
item.description:
They moved the materials for some weapons around in CU2, they might’ve moved the Hivehand’s and never changed the path to it on the alien grunt model.

Confirmed. “models/xenian/agrunt_02.mdl” points to “models\v_hgun”, rather than “models\weapons\v_hgun”.

Read full topic
item.source: Small graphic glitch on Alien Grunt

item.title: Small graphic glitch on Alien Grunt
item.dc:creator: Crawfish
item.description:
Hm, that’s interesting. It might actually be a bug, I’ve never quite seen anything like it. A dev would probably have to explain it/make suggestions on how to discover why it’s happening.

Read full topic
item.source: Small graphic glitch on Alien Grunt

item.title: Small graphic glitch on Alien Grunt
item.dc:creator: Qu1ntus2010
item.description:
Validating steam files found 14 ‘issues’.
Reloaded the same sequence, but without any result.

Ps: I bought the game after the Crossfire update.

Pps. The 3 other alien grunts in the room DO have nice textures. See below.

2016-01-02_00002.jpg1920×1080 382 KB

Read full topic
item.source: Small graphic glitch on Alien Grunt

item.title: Small graphic glitch on Alien Grunt
item.dc:creator: Crawfish
item.description:
Have you verified your game’s files?
Also, I think bugs like this can be caused by continuing old saves after the Crossfire update, so if you did that then that may be the issue.

Read full topic
item.source: Small graphic glitch on Alien Grunt
